title: Get a premium MagSafe wallet at a bargain price
description: With real-time tracking and audio alerts, this MagSafe wallet with Find My is easy to locate, whether it’s nearby or across town. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: With real-time tracking and audio alerts, this MagSafe wallet with Find My is easy to locate, whether it’s nearby or across town.
text: Daily deals Save 25% on this RFID-blocking MagSafe wallet that doubles as an iPhone stand. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Tired of retracing your steps to find your lost wallet? This Folding MagSafe wallet with Find My can stop your endless searching. Snag one, and you can use real-time tracking and audio alerts to quickly locate it, whether it’s nearby or across town. Designed to work seamlessly with iPhone 12 through iPhone 16, it offers secure storage for up to eight cards while doubling as a versatile accessory. For a limited time, you can save 25% and get one for $29.99. (Note: This MagSafe wallet is not compatible with iPhone 12 mini or iPhone 13 mini, or with iPhone 16e.) Folding MagSafe wallet with Find My Apple’s Find My network makes it easy to locate missing Apple items like iPhones, Macs and anything attached to an AirTag. The Folding MagSafe Wallet, which attaches magnetically to compatible iPhones, works with Find My. And that means you’ll never lose track of your wallet again. It stays firmly in place on your MagSafe-compatible iPhone or case, even during your busiest days. (The manufacturer says the MagSafe wallet’s ultra-strong magnetic attachment is six times stronger than Apple’s official wallets.) This premium wallet is crafted from scratch-resistant PU leather, combining durability with a modern look. Its RFID-blocking design adds an extra layer of protection, keeping your cards safe from unauthorized scans. Premium features at a bargain price Beyond storage, this Find My-compatible MagSafe wallet offers functionality you didn’t know you needed. It transforms into an adjustable phone stand, perfect for hands-free video calls, reading or streaming your favorite shows. The design looks much like Journey’s well-reviewed Ezmo wallet, but costs much less. Apple’s own MagSafe wallet — made of the widely derided FineWoven material — retails for $59. And it doesn’t even double as an iPhone stand. Plus, this MagSafe wallet supports wireless charging, so there’s no need to remove the wallet when charging your iPhone. And the built-in rechargeable battery powers the wallet’s tracking features for up to four months per charge, giving you peace of mind without constant upkeep. Save on a Folding MagSafe Wallet that works with Apple’s Find My network Make your everyday carry smarter with this Folding MagSafe Wallet for $29.99 (regularly $39.99), designed exclusively for iPhone users. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the MagSafe wallet with Find My support on January 31, 2025. We updated the information.
html:
• Daily deals

Tired of retracing your steps to find your lost wallet? This Folding MagSafe wallet with Find My can stop your endless searching. Snag one, and you can use real-time tracking and audio alerts to quickly locate it, whether it’s nearby or across town.

Designed to work seamlessly with iPhone 12 through iPhone 16, it offers secure storage for up to eight cards while doubling as a versatile accessory. For a limited time, you can save 25% and get one for $29.99. (Note: This MagSafe wallet is not compatible with iPhone 12 mini or iPhone 13 mini, or with iPhone 16e.)

Folding MagSafe wallet with Find My

Apple’s Find My network makes it easy to locate missing Apple items like iPhones, Macs and anything attached to an AirTag. The Folding MagSafe Wallet, which attaches magnetically to compatible iPhones, works with Find My. And that means you’ll never lose track of your wallet again.

It stays firmly in place on your MagSafe-compatible iPhone or case, even during your busiest days. (The manufacturer says the MagSafe wallet’s ultra-strong magnetic attachment is six times stronger than Apple’s official wallets.)

This premium wallet is crafted from scratch-resistant PU leather, combining durability with a modern look. Its RFID-blocking design adds an extra layer of protection, keeping your cards safe from unauthorized scans.

Premium features at a bargain price

Beyond storage, this Find My-compatible MagSafe wallet offers functionality you didn’t know you needed. It transforms into an adjustable phone stand, perfect for hands-free video calls, reading or streaming your favorite shows. The design looks much like Journey’s well-reviewed Ezmo wallet, but costs much less.

Apple’s own MagSafe wallet — made of the widely derided FineWoven material — retails for $59. And it doesn’t even double as an iPhone stand.

Plus, this MagSafe wallet supports wireless charging, so there’s no need to remove the wallet when charging your iPhone. And the built-in rechargeable battery powers the wallet’s tracking features for up to four months per charge, giving you peace of mind without constant upkeep.

Save on a Folding MagSafe Wallet that works with Apple’s Find My network

Make your everyday carry smarter with this Folding MagSafe Wallet for $29.99 (regularly $39.99), designed exclusively for iPhone users.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the MagSafe wallet with Find My support on January 31, 2025. We updated the information.
